CustomField.label: What are the CSG Values align?

value.fullName: Pursue the priorities of its member states
value.label: Pursue the priorities of its member states

value.fullName: Engage leaders from all three branches of state government
value.label: Engage leaders from all three branches of state government

value.fullName: Have a regional focus, a national presence and a global reach
value.label: Have a regional focus, a national presence and a global reach

value.fullName: Be a respected and trusted source for best practices and policy expertise
value.label: Be a respected and trusted source for best practices and policy expertise

value.fullName: Convene leader to leader interactions and foster leadership development
value.label: Convene leader to leader interactions and foster leadership development

value.fullName: Zealously advocate for the states in our federal system of government
value.label: Zealously advocate for the states in our federal system of government

value.fullName: Adhere to the highest ethical standards
value.label: Adhere to the highest ethical standards

value.fullName: Respect diversity and act with civility
value.label: Respect diversity and act with civility
